## Introduction

## An example

```{r}
path_default_nix <- tempdir()

rix(r_ver = "latest",
    r_pkgs = c("quarto"),
    system_pkgs = "quarto",
    tex_pkgs = c("float", "hyperref"),
    ide = "other",
    project_path = path_default_nix,
    overwrite = FALSE,
    print = TRUE)

```
